subject: Baseball
Lightning
lead_paragraph: Gregory Echenique, one of the nation’s top high school centers, has signed a letter of intent to play for Rutgers. He is a Venezuelan native who starred at St. Benedict’s Prep in Newark. Rutgers also said that forward Jonathan Mitchell, Mr. New York Basketball 2006, would transfer from Florida.
